org.mrpdaemon.sec.encfs

Class EncFSInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.FilterInputStream
        • org.mrpdaemon.sec.encfs.EncFSInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class EncFSInputStream
extends FilterInputStream
    FilterInputStream extension that allows decrypted data to be read from a file on an EncFS volume.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EncFSInputStream(EncFSVolume volume, InputStream in, String volumePath)
      Create a new EncFSInputStream for reading decrypted data off a file on an EncFS volume

    • Constructor Detail

      • EncFSInputStream

        public EncFSInputStream(EncFSVolume volume,
                InputStream in,
                String volumePath)
                 throws EncFSCorruptDataException,
                        EncFSUnsupportedException,
                        UnsupportedEncodingException
        Create a new EncFSInputStream for reading decrypted data off a file on an EncFS volume
        Parameters:
        volume - Volume hosting the file to read
        in - Input stream to access the raw (encrypted) file contents
        volumePath - Volume path of the file being decrypted (needed for externalIVChaining)
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException
        EncFSCorruptDataException
        EncFSUnsupportedException
